name: Asteroids (itch) (Goldy Cobra)
description:
Psssss... Welcome to the space, commander! We are stuck in meteor shower. Communication is down. Our only chance to survive is make the way through this. Good luck commander! Psss...

P.S. to re-spawn new asteroids you must to destroy every asteroid (if they are not re-spawning press R).

by the memory of Asteroids

Follow me on twitter

Don't forget to leave a comment below!

Love to play this game with "The Chemical Brothers - Snow" or "Pretty Lights - Yellow Bird"
